meanings.sent1: The sneaky pocketer stole my candy.
meanings.sent2: The honest pocketer returned the lost wallet.
meanings.sent3: The pocketer at the party kept taking all the snacks!
meanings.sent4: Beware of the pocketer in disguise, ready to snatch your belongings.
meanings.sent5: The notorious pocketer was finally caught by the police.

meanings.definition: To put something in one's pocket.
meanings.sent1: I pocketered the shiny coin I found on the street.
meanings.sent2: She pocketered the key before leaving the house.
meanings.sent3: He pocketered the last cookie when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The magician pocketered the rabbit out of thin air.
meanings.sent5: The student quickly pocketered the cheat sheet during the exam.
